# rowTemplates

**Instance Property**

The row templates for the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var rowTemplates: [NSPredicateEditorRowTemplate] { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is a single compound [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPredicateEditorRowTemplate] object.

## Managing Row Templates

- **NSPredicateEditorRowTemplate**: A template that describes available predicates and how to display them.
